publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1658 Nicola Sturgeon: Prescription Charges —That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to freeze prescription charges at their current level and thereafter to establish an independent working group to review the system of prescription charges and bring forward proposals for reform within 12 months. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Kay Ullrich*, Linda Fabiani*, Fiona Hyslop*, Michael Russell*, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Shona Robison*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*

S1M-1658 Nicola Sturgeon: Prescription Charges —That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to freeze prescription charges at their current level and thereafter to establish an independent working group to review the system of prescription charges and bring forward proposals for reform within 12 months. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Roseanna Cunningham, Kay Ullrich, Linda Fabiani, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam, Bruce Crawford, Mr Alex Salmond*
S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Irene McGugan*, Robert Brown*
S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Alasdair Morgan*

S1M-1658 Nicola Sturgeon: Prescription Charges —That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to freeze prescription charges at their current level and thereafter to establish an independent working group to review the system of prescription charges and bring forward proposals for reform within 12 months. S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1658 Prescription Charges (lodged on 13 February 2001) Nora Radcliffe*
